name: Stream Animals
description: Stream Animals brings you closer to your streaming community. You and your viewers try to be the last one standing as the land falls into the water.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows 7 or Later Processor: Intel i5 equivalent or better Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX970 or equivalent Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Additional Notes: Computer must be able to handle streaming.
